backend/main.mo: Main canister handles user profiles, contact form submissions, and server-side WhatsApp notifications via HTTP outcalls with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old contact submissions to a new format with WhatsApp notification status fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test mappings for WhatsApp automation updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, pages, config files, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders the app within a shared site layout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Internatio: Phone input component with country selector and dial code support using UI select and input elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, services links, and contact options.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides a responsive header with logo, navigation links, active-state highlighting, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the page with a header, footer, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Displays a call‑to‑action section with title, description, and primary/secondary CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Implements an accordion-style FAQ list with expandable answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Shows a benefits list with icons, titles, and descriptions in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Renders a pricing plan card with features, pricing details, and an optional 'most popular' badge.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Displays a grid of common business problems with icons and highlighted styling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Presents a service description with sections for what it is, why it matters, and business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Shows testimonials and a case study highlighting business results and improvements.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Renders a three-step marketing section with icons, titles, and descriptions to explain the lead generation process.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Displays a grid of value propositions with icons, titles, and descriptions passed via props.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: Provides a styled WhatsApp CTA button using a default or custom link and label.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines site-wide configuration including branding, WhatsApp info, contact details, and CTA labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and manages related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing login state, stored identities, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks, currently only imports dependencies.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom color variables, and utility classes including teal glow and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, mission text, value props, and sections describing the company’s differentiators.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: React contact form page handling validation, submission, and generating WhatsApp links after successful form send.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing-focused homepage displaying hero content, benefits, pricing plans, and CTAs using various components.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page showing tiered plans, ROI highlights, and marketing CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page listing detailed service descriptions and business impact sections with CTAs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLink.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links and formats contact form data into prefilled WhatsApp messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, issues, and feature requests for implementing automated WhatsApp delivery and related observability.
